plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Veuillez préciser les actions que le the: Please detail which actions the thermostat is allowed to perform for heating and cooling.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Précisez l'écart de température que le t: Please detail the temperature range the thermostat is allowed to drive.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Pour chauffer je dois ?: To heat, what should be done?
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Pour refroidir je dois ?: To cool, what should be done?
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Pour tout arrêter je dois ?: To stop everything, what should be done?
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.A chaque changement de consigne je dois: For each change of set point, what should also be done?
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Avec les modes, vous pouvez rajouter à v: With modes, you can add to your thermostat some predefined set points. For example a comfort mode triggering an action to your thermostat with a set point temperature of 20°C.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.La déclaration des ouvertures concernées: Definition of all openings that may impact your thermostat (door, window...) will allow the thermostat to control properly the temperature.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Cron de renvoi des commandes du thermost: Cron to send back thermostat commands (stop, heating, cooling), if your thermostat doesn't start or stop correctly, use this check.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Délai max entre 2 relevés de température: Maximum time period between 2 temperature readings (min)
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Délai maximum entre 2 relévés de tempéra: Maximum time between 2 temperature readings before putting the thermostat in failure state
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Pour une meilleure régulation, il est co: For better control, it is advisable not to change these coefficients as they are computed and updated automatically.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Autorise le thermostat à partir avant po: Allow thermostat to start earlier, in order to reach set point temperature at expected time. Warning: this works only if your thermostat is managed by Agenda plugin.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Durée des cycles de chauffe/climatisatio: Duration of heating/cooling cycles (cannot be less than 15 min)
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.% minimum de cycle à faire (sinon la mis: Minimal % of cycle to perform (otherwise heating will be switched on during next cycle)
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Seuil de déclenchement de la défaillance: Threshold triggering heating failure (1 by default)
Threshold triggering cooling failure (1 by default)
plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/thermosta.Cron de vérification des valeurs des son: Value temperature sensors check, if your thermostat doesn't start or stop correctly, use this ckeck.

plugins/thermostat/core/class/thermostat.: Attention la température intérieure e: : Attention la température intérieure est en dessous du seuil autorisé :

plugins/thermostat/desktop/php/panel.php.Attention une trop grande plage de date: Warning: a too wide date range can take very long time to be calculated, or even will never be displayed

plugins/thermostat/desktop/js/thermostat.Etes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce mo: Do you really want to deleted this mode
You don't have any scheduling. Please click here to schedule your thermostat with Agenda plugin.
plugins/thermostat/desktop/js/thermostat.Liste des programmations sur le thermost: Scheduling list on thermostat of Agenda plugin
